channel.title: Hi, i'm new to moparscape but i do know the basic stuff
channel.description: I was wondering...When i go to moparscape and i log in...i realise how some monsters are not there. How do i add monsters to my moparscape? And how can i make it so i can i play with a friend of mines. He plays mopar too.

item.title: Hi, i'm new to moparscape but i do know the basic stuff
item.dc:creator: @pur3_pik3r_9 pur3 pik3r 9
item.description:
@pur3_pik3r_9 wrote:

well what i said always works and ur little sig. lol 127.0.0.1 it is a server for just ppl to get on sepret not other ppl to get on with u change the ip and stuff

item.title: Hi, i'm new to moparscape but i do know the basic stuff
item.dc:creator: @pur3_pik3r_9 pur3 pik3r 9
item.description:
@pur3_pik3r_9 wrote:

to add monster (there called npc) u type ::npc and the number… ex. ::npc 49 thats bring up a hellhound… then to put in there hp u go to ur file npc.clg im sure not 100% sure but its somthing like that and u SAVE then log back off then on again and ur npc will have hp. and its almost the same in the shops

Read full topic
